text: Borislav Drljača (Serbian Cyrillic: Борислав Дрљача; 29 August 1941 – 11 October 2020), better known as Bora Drljača, was a Serbian folk singer. Drljača recorded over four hundred songs including "Stari vuk" (Old Wolf), "Ne namiguj na me tuđa ženo" (Don't Wink at Me, Someone Else's Wife), and "Plači, mala, plači" (Cry, Baby, Cry). Drljača also appeared on reality shows Veliki Brat VIP 4 (2010) and Parovi 4 (2015). Drljača died of colon cancer on 11 October 2020 in Belgrade, aged 79. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:Serbian singers Category:Television personalities Category:Folk singers
title: Boro Drljača
